Your Supabase, Your Server

Self-hosted Supabase on your own VPS — deployed in minutes, managed with ease.

Get Started in 5 Minutes

Zero vendor lock-in

Your Supabase instances run on your servers, not ours. If you stop using Supabyoi — or if Supabyoi goes down — your instances keep running. Nothing phones home, nothing stops working.

Cancel anytime and your Postgres databases, Auth, Storage, and every other service stay exactly where they are. You own the server, you own the data, you own the stack.
